original_title: Gone Before Her Time: When the Music Stopped
overview: Over the course of the two-hour special, GONE BEFORE HER TIME, we'll celebrate the controversies, influences, and legacies of five iconic female performers whose lives tragically ended just as they were at the peaks of their careers. These are vocalists so big, we only need their first names to conjure their music in our ears and beauty in our eyes.
title: Gone Before Her Time: When the Music Stopped
